Armstrong.action: Neil is INTENSE and INTENSELY FOCUSED, impressive given the SEVERE TURBULENCE that bangs him around the cockpit.

Armstrong.action: Neil is determined to remain detached despite adrenaline spike.

Armstrong.action: Neil packs his suitcase methodically and emotionlessly, showing focus and preparation for the mission.

Armstrong.action: Neil hesitates when asked why he has to go on the mission.

Armstrong.action: Neil quietly reads the mission briefing in the car, showing focus and preparation before the mission.

Armstrong.action: Neil gives Janet only a perfunctory peck and leaves without looking back.

Armstrong.action: Neil’s heart rate speeds up during the medical check, but he remains composed and passes the examination.
Armstrong.assessment: While the increased heart rate shows natural human anxiety, passing the medical exam demonstrates physical and mental fitness, supporting competence.

Armstrong.action: Neil opens his eyes, takes in the enormous Saturn V rocket, and rises quickly up its side on the high speed elevator with Buzz and Mike and Deke.
Armstrong.assessment: This action shows Armstrong's readiness and physical capability to proceed with the mission, indicating confidence and focus.

Armstrong.action: Despite the staggering crowd and media presence, Neil looks away and focuses intently on the checklist on his wrist.

Armstrong.action: When the elevator jerks to a halt and the door swings open, Neil immediately grabs his oxygen tank and leads the others onto the next stage.

Armstrong.action: Neil hands his oxygen tank to a tech who approaches to help, then pauses briefly when he notices techs who resemble familiar people, before closing his eyes.

Armstrong.action: Neil’s thought it through, he isn’t fazed at all when Deke mentions the possibility of purging the suits and going to sleep if the landing goes south and he gets stranded.

Armstrong.action: Neil starts into checks with the others, running the Emergency Detection system and methodically going through the Flight Plan, Mission Rules, and system checks.
Armstrong.assessment: This demonstrates Armstrong's thoroughness, attention to detail, and procedural discipline, all key indicators of competence in a high-stakes environment.

Armstrong.action: Neil appears seemingly oblivious to the stifling, claustrophobic atmosphere inside the capsule and focuses intently on the pre-launch procedures.

Armstrong.action: Neil is seemingly calm with hand on the abort handle during the tense pre-launch countdown.

Armstrong.action: Neil's eyes show a wealth of emotions but remain dark, intense, steady, and unyielding during the violent launch.

Armstrong.action: Neil wills himself to focus, eyes rapidly checking clock and console amid violent shaking and noise.

Armstrong.action: Neil glances to his right to assess the reactions of Buzz and Mike during the chaotic launch.

Armstrong.action: Neil’s eyes TICK to his CHECKLIST... ROLL AT 15 SECONDS. He glances at the clock, PUNCHES in the maneuver... and we FEEL the rocket ROLL, g-forces so INTENSE all three men turn GREEN.
Armstrong.assessment: This action shows Armstrong's ability to maintain focus and execute precise maneuvers under extreme physical stress, indicating strong technical skill and mental resilience.

Armstrong.action: Neil PUSHES THROUGH, eyes GLUED to the instruments as, at last, the roar FADES and, faintly, we hear COMMS...
Armstrong.assessment: Demonstrates Armstrong's determination and concentration despite intense discomfort, reflecting high competence in managing critical situations.

Armstrong.action: Neil hits a button and the escape rocket and protective shield are JETTISONED. BLUE SKY appears in the window.
Armstrong.assessment: Shows Armstrong's timely and confident execution of complex spacecraft operations, indicating technical proficiency and situational awareness.

Armstrong.action: Neil ignores the terrifying rapid change from blue sky to black space and continues preparations.

Armstrong.action: Neil HITS the throttle at ignition after countdown.

Armstrong.action: Neil holds his calculations out to Mike to help him make the necessary adjustment.
